name: Silk Morning Robe in 'Spice'
description:
What everyone needs when perusing the papers on the deck/balcony/veranda/poolside on a sunny Saturday summer morning is a short and sexy silk robe.

This robe in 100% silk features long sleeves, pockets, tasselled belt and generous hood; perfect for disguising bed head and deflects harsh sunlight. 

All garments arrive in our beautiful packaging, perfect for presenting as a gift or to spoil yourself!

name: Stretchy Satin Shorties
description:
Wearing french knickers instead of granny underwear is just damn sexy. 

These sleep shorts are perfect for wandering around the house on a hot day. Can be worn higher on the hip for a more 'cheeky' look.

Available in ‘licorice’ black, 97% silk 3% spandex with elasticated waist.

All garments arrive in packaging as seen in the pictures, perfect for presenting as a gift or to spoil yourself.

name: 'The' Negligee
description:
This sexy number inspired the whole collection using the vintage ideals of enduring quality and luxurious elegance. Turns out we are making things like they used to. Think 'Mad Men' or Elizabeth Taylor in bUtterfield 8!

Fitted cups in sheer embossed chiffon edged in soft mesh frills. Ribbon straps wrap over to an elastic section at back for added support and comfort. Sheer hem detail also edged in frills. 

Can be worn as a slip or nightgown.

This style is available in ‘Noir’ and ‘Crème’; 97% silk and 3% spandex for a little stretch.

All garments arrive in our beautiful packaging, perfect for presenting as a gift or to spoil yourself.

name: Vanilla Silk Baby Doll Slip
description:
Simple elegant design reminiscent of art deco architecture, alternating a delicate sheer mesh with delicious liquid silk satin.  

Baby-doll silhouette, with fitted bust and fuller skirt section. Can be worn as a slip or a negligee.

Available in 'Chocolate' and 'Vanilla', and like the best icecream; this negligee is a delight.

All garments arrive in our beautiful packaging, perfect for presenting as a gift or to spoil yourself.

name: Feather Light Robe
description:
This beautifully soft robe features long sleeves, pockets, tasselled belt and generous hood; perfect for disguising bed head and deflects harsh sunlight!

Silk cotton fabric with feathers print feels lovely against your skin.
